Arkham Print

PDF generator to print cards at home

About Arkham Horror LCG

Arkham Horror LCG is a card game by Fantasy Flight Games. Its a deckbuilder / story-driven horror adventure game based primarily on the works of HP Lovecraft. The game uses an "Living Card Game" (LCG) model, where a specific box contains a known set of cards. This removes any 'gambling' or luck from purchasing the cards and results in a better overall model.

https://gitlab.com/ahiskali/arkham-proxy
